name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the National Audit Office of China released the "Audit Results of the Budget Implementation of Central Departments in 2023". It mentioned that the Ministry of Transport, the Ministry of Education, the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology and the Market Supervision Headquarters illegally used government data to collect fees and make a profit of 248 million yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Comments under Qingfeng Steamed Bun Shop:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a report on July 17, the wave of layoffs and salary cuts in the Chinese financial industry has become more murky. People familiar with the matter told Caixin that some Hong Kong employees of Chinese financial institutions were asked to return part of their bonuses, with the highest amount reaching tens of millions of Hong Kong dollars.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Beijing: Compulsory education schools are not allowed to use foreign textbooks.
The "Beijing Primary and Secondary School Textbook Selection Rules" were recently released. The Municipal Education Commission made it clear that primary and secondary school teaching must be selected from the textbook catalog released by the national and municipal education administrative departments.
Compulsory education schools are not allowed to use foreign textbooks, and ordinary high schools are generally not allowed to use foreign textbooks. Each district should establish a monitoring and evaluation mechanism for the selection and use of textbooks.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, heavy rains and flooding have continued in many parts of Henan Province. Some residents were kneeling on the ground praying for rain in June, and praying again in July that it would not rain again.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the night of July 16, the flood situation in Baoji, Shaanxi. The Shiba River and its tributaries overflowed the dikes, causing serious flooding in the streets. Videos showed that many vehicles were washed away and bridges were washed away by water. Some netizens live-streamed the flood situation, but the live-streaming room was banned by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 16, media person Peng Yuanwen wrote: 22 days have passed, who is the murderer of Hu Youping? A lot of information about the gunman who assassinated Trump was soon dug up. But Hu Youping has been killed until now, and even the name of the murderer is unknown. Why is this?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 15, in Qujing, Yunnan, a netizen found a warehouse full of rotten meat and said he had reported it to the Market Supervision Administration.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 17, Nanyang, Henan. A man posted a video saying that his child was washed away by water at the Beigengzhuang flood bridge on the afternoon of July 15. As of now, the man who posted the video said in the comment section that the child has not been found yet.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Quanzhou City issued a document requiring personnel within the system to take the lead in implementing the three-child policy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 16, Global Times: The Third Plenary Session of the 18th CPC Central Committee is "very important to the world"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At about 5 o'clock on July 17, an emergency water supply truck on the East-West Elevated Highway in Shenyang had an accident and hit the elevated baffle, causing the baffle to fall and kill a passerby.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, some netizens revealed that SAIC Passenger Vehicle will implement a 97% salary reduction for all employees starting from July, and employees with performance evaluation rating of B and below will face a substantial salary cut.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 17, a man holding a license plate stopped a car running on the streets of Wuhan, accusing Baidu of violating the traffic law and posing a safety hazard.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 17, Shanghai Jing'an District Middle School Communist School announced the opening of classes

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 15, Jiangsu. A food delivery rider said: I have a bachelor's degree in accounting, and now I deliver food. What about you?
Netizens replied: "I have a bachelor's degree, and now I am making harassing calls" "I have a bachelor's degree in civil engineering, and now I also deliver food"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 15, in Wuhan, Hubei, a netizen posted a video saying that a man on an electric bike suddenly kicked down the electric bike of a food delivery man and then drove away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Confiscate illegal income of 1 yuan, fine 8,000 yuan, a supermarket in Jixi County, Anhui Province was punished for violating the Food Safety Law
The Market Supervision and Administration Bureau of Jixi County, Anhui Province recently issued a penalty information. The Le Parkn & Bakery Supermarket Zhongwang Road Store in Jixi County sold food that had exceeded the shelf life and failed to establish and comply with the purchase inspection record system as required. The Jixi County Market Supervision and Administration Bureau issued a warning in accordance with the law, confiscated illegal income of 1 yuan, and imposed an administrative penalty of 8,000 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 17, a fire broke out at Jiuding Department Store in Zigong, Sichuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/K4sAzNTzTk

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 12, Shandong. Parents of Yantai students posted a message to report the Yantai Education Bureau's random charging phenomenon. Parents of primary school students must download an app called "Good Score" to check their students' grades. To check the grades one day in advance, they must recharge the VIP membership fee of 365 yuan a year. To view the grades for free, they have to wait a day. To view the grades after one day, they must recharge to view the wrong questions for free.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 17 (Release) Jiujiang, Jiangxi. A Red Army statue on Jiujiang Pedestrian Street was removed, sparking dissatisfaction among netizens. Netizens responded, "Has Jiangxi also fallen into the trap of a simple life?" "Jiujiang City has spies infiltrating, investigate strictly."
